entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 12.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. 40 percent chance of showers over southern sections late this afternoon. Fog patches over northern sections early this morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 12. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 4. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 70 percent chance of showers this evening. 70 percent chance of wet flurries over northern sections after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 except southwest 50 gusting to 70 over southern sections. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Sunday 9 April 2023
